aboutMe.paragraph1: My name is Lucas Amaral. I am 32 years old. I live in Rio de Janeiro and I am a front-end developer.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I like to talk about pop culture, more specifically about movies. I like to watch movies and tv series, I like to play video games and read books and comic books on my free time.
aboutMe.paragraph3: I graduated in information systems in 2014 and I work as a front-end developer since 2015.

text.workDescription:
I help with the maintenance and development of the applications of the payment and my account (order tracking and user data) fluxes.

Each of these projects has a front-end application, which we use react, typescript, styled-components and cypress. And a backend application (BFF - back-end - for - front-end) which we use nestjs and typescript for the payment application and fastify with functional programming and typescript for my account application.

We also have a legacy project using nextjs for the front-end and expressJs for the BFF.
I used css to make visual updates on an internal application for Bradesco Bank.

At the end of 2016, the company TIM stopped being a client of Amo agency and started a new contract with Grito agency. Due to this fact, all developers involved with the TIM account were transferred from one agency to another. So I continued helping with the maintenance of TIM Brasil's website being part of a project to add responsivity to the site.

I also was part of the implementation of pages with user interactivity using Vue.js.
I used to help with the maintenance of TIM Brasil's website. Making updates according to the client's demand and creating new pages when it was needed.
